name: Complex Youtube Theme
description: Complex is a sleek, clean minimalistic Theme For Youtube. Inspired by Sarthak Narain "Youtube Vibra" . Plays well in Dark and Lightmode. First time coding a theme so codes are all over the place, but if you have any issues leave a note and ill look at it. Thank You!!! Here are the Screenshots.
additional_info:
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS


Install the 'Stylish' Plugin to your browser

Click the 'Install Style' button on theme.

Make sure that you're using the new Youtube!

Features:
Larger Avatars with spinning animation.
One image Artist Photo, Who needs 3?
Cleaner font size 
Video Player Depth
Larger Home Page Description Font
Time Display Cleaned Up

---UPDATE 1 01/02/17 Fixed Progress Bar and Broken Header on Artist page---

** Testing full screen search** COMING SOON
